item.title: [help] ddp
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

[quote=“sjoukjeowns, post:4, topic:326673”][quote author=moparclient link=topic=423084.msg3106206#msg3106206 date=1264169227]

Try running another client login with another user and spec that one it will probably work on players;)!

stop posting shit you only getting post count, don’t post unless you know how to help.

back on topic

specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 402);

see that? somewhere in that voids it sends a boolean than will make the second hit appear, seatch for it and check the code, than just remove a small line and it will hit highter than 0
[/quote]
Uhm like you’re helping? i do help because some spec won’t work on npcs![/quote]

actually i’m helping and i just don’t post where exatly it is because he need to learn how to code, this way i don’t spoonfeed

item.title: [help] ddp
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

hello, i have this problem with my ddp then i use the spec att, i just hit 0 and 13 for example how i can hit like over 0 and 13 :S you know what i mean.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1231 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 402); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1231 && specialAmount > 24){ hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); setAnimation(402); }

Read full topic
